main event: A round, whitish-glowing object with a trail of flame was observed descending and then exploding.
interesting points: The object was the size of a nickel at arm's length.
The object had a trail of flame.
The object exploded after about 45 seconds of observation.
The color and trail of flame indicate the object was likely a meteor or bolide.
The report was submitted as a continuation of a previous case on unidentified flying objects.
sighted object: a round, whitish-glowing object with a trail of flame
